post.text: Our children are watching to see what kind of example we set for them.

comment.author: Kerry
comment.text: Power driven , corrupted , habitual liar , above the law , deceitful , back stabbing , greedy...all of which have been proven true....Thats what people want for President?

replies.author: Jacquilynn
replies.text: 11 more days. Better hope she doesn't have the IRS audit you for posting that.
